channel.title: Black Mesa on OSX doesnt launch
channel.description:
Hi, I have an iMac late 2012, intel core i7 3.4ghz, 16gb RAM, 1TB HD, GTX680 2GB VRAM...
I installed steam via winebottler and it works fine! I also installed black mesa with wine in the correct directory, it shows up in the menu and when I launched it for the first time it downloaded the source 2007 SDK..
but now that this has downloaded i wanted to launch it and it always shows me the same error:
![Bildschirmfoto 2013-12-27 um 02.30.43.jpg|440x136](upload://jqxDUnz5GsgqcSzvneFxLlIb6s2.jpeg)
hope you can help me!
thank you and enjoy your holidays!

item.title: Black Mesa on OSX doesnt launch
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
sounds like the content servers unavailable bug mentioned elsewhere, I don’t think it was resolved but you can always install Windows

Read full topic
item.source: Black Mesa on OSX doesnt launch
